spell1.name: TELEPATHIC PULSE
spell1.description: Fire a psionic beam to deal damage; the longer the beam hits, the higher the damage.
spell1.changeDescription: Top-end damage reduced: 99 energy 120/s → 110/s; full energy 150/s → 140/s

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Damage increases with energy: 0 - 70/s, 99 - 110/s, full energy - 140/s

spell6.name: MIND'S AEGIS
spell6.description: Create a levitating barrier at the designated location.

spell4.name: PSYCHIC SPEAR
spell4.description: Seize control of an enemy's sentience—damage dealt to the sentience cascades to the physical form and can be pierced by Telepathic Pulse. When the sentience shatters, it unleashes extra damage on its owner.

attributes.label: LINK BREAK DISTANCE
attributes.value: Link breaks if target and sentience are >15m apart

spell2.name: PSIONIC SEDUCTION
spell2.description: Project a forward psychic assault that stuns foes and prevents them from unleashing their Ultimate Abilities; if the effect lingers, it gradually commandeers their mind, forcing them to move toward Emma Frost.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: 80/s; distance falloff begins at 10m to 50% at 30m; angle falloff begins at 7° to 80% at 20°

attributes.label: CONTROL STACKS
attributes.value: Enemies accumulate 10 stacks/s while exposed; decay 10/s out of field; control at 15 stacks (once per activation per enemy)

spell3.name: DIAMOND FORM
spell3.description: Activate Diamond Form to transform your attack style while gaining Damage Reduction and becoming Unstoppable.

spell7.name: FACETED FURY (Diamond)
spell7.description: In Diamond Form, deliver a crushing double-fisted strike to enemies.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: First & second hit: 50; third hit: 70; fourth hit: 80

spell8.name: CARBON CRUSH (Diamond)
spell8.description: In Diamond Form, lunge forward to grab an enemy, then execute a back slam to inflict damage.

attributes.label: SPECIAL
attributes.value: Cancels enemy Ultimates during start-up; can grapple airborne targets

spell5.name: CRYSTAL KICK (Diamond)
spell5.description: In Diamond Form, unleash a flying kick forward and knock back enemies; extra damage is dealt if they're propelled into a wall.

spell9.name: MIND LINK (Team-Up)
spell9.description: With Psylocke & Magneto: creates a Mental Projection (Duplicate Illusion) in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities. Emma, as the Anchor, gains +100 Max Health.
